snippet: The leagues announced on Friday that an agreement for a full complement of football games between the conferences starting in 2017 had fizzled because of scheduling issues.
abstract: Pacific-12 and Big Ten announce jointly that the proposed agreement for each of their members to play a football game against a team from the other conference starting in 2017 has fallen apart.
lead_paragraph: The leagues announced on Friday that an agreement for a full complement of football games between the conferences starting in 2017 had fizzled because of scheduling issues.

headline.seo: Pac-12 and Big Ten Partnership Falls Apart
headline.main: Partnership Linking Pac-12 and Big Ten Falls Apart
headline.print_headline: Pac-12 and Big Ten Drop Scheduling Plan
